âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Generates SBOMs for container images, filesystems, archives â€¢ Supports OCI, Docker and Singularity image formats â€¢ Linux distribution identification â€¢ Works seamlessly with Grype vulnerability scanner
ðŸ“– Summary: Syft is a CLI tool and Go library that generates Software Bill of Materials (SBOMs) from container images and filesystems. It supports various image formats, integrates with vulnerability scanners like Grype, and can create signed SBOM attestations. Syft enables users to gain visibility into their software dependencies for vulnerability management and license compliance.
